data.title: RGB to HSV conversion
data.solution:
color = input()[1:]
r,g,b = int(color[:2],16)/255,int(color[2:4],16)/255,int(color[4:],16)/255
cmax = max(r,g,b)
cmin = min(r,g,b)
delta = cmax-cmin
h = 0
if delta:
    if cmax == r:
        h = ((g-b)/delta)%6
    elif cmax == g:
        h = (b-r)/delta+2
    elif cmax == b:
        h = (r-g)/delta+4
s = 0
if cmax:
    s = delta/cmax
print("({}°,{}%,{}%)".format(int(60*h), int(100*s), int(100*cmax)))
data.statement:
You receive a color formated in RGB in hexadecimal form ({{#FF8c00}} for R = 255, G = 140, B = 0) and you must convert it in HSV format {{(H°,S%,V%)}} by following this procedure:
The [[R]],[[G]],[[B]] values are divided by 255 to change the range from 0..255 to 0..1:
[[R']] = [[R]]/255
[[G']] = [[G]]/255
[[B']] = [[B]]/255
[[Cmax]] = max([[R']], [[G']], [[B']])
[[Cmin]] = min([[R']], [[G']], [[B']])
[[Δ]] = [[Cmax]] - [[Cmin]]
Hue calculation:
If [[Δ]] = 0: [[H]] = 0°
Otherwise:
  If [[Cmax]] = [[R']]:
    [[H]] = 60°*(([[G']]-[[B']])/[[Δ]])mod 6
  If [[Cmax]] = [[G']]:
    [[H]] = 60°*(([[B']]-[[R']])/[[Δ]]+2)
  If [[Cmax]] = [[B']]:
    [[H]] = 60°*(([[R']]-[[G']])/[[Δ]]+4)
Saturation calculation:
If [[Cmax]] != 0:
  [[S]] = [[Δ]]/[[Cmax]]
Otherwise:
  [[S]] = 0
Value calculation:
[[V]] = [[Cmax]]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You receive a color formated in RGB in hexadecimal form (#FF8c00 for R = 255, G = 140, B = 0) and you must convert it in HSV format (H°,S%,V%) by following this procedure:
The R,G,B values are divided by 255 to change the range from 0..255 to 0..1:
R' = R/255
G' = G/255
B' = B/255
Cmax = max(R', G', B')
Cmin = min(R', G', B')
Δ = Cmax - Cmin
Hue calculation:
If Δ = 0: H = 0°
Otherwise:
If Cmax = R':
H = 60°*((G'-B')/Δ)mod 6
If Cmax = G':
H = 60°*((B'-R')/Δ+2)
If Cmax = B':
H = 60°*((R'-G')/Δ+4)
Saturation calculation:
If Cmax != 0:
S = Δ/Cmax
Otherwise:
S = 0
Value calculation:
V = Cmax
Input
One string Color formated as #RRGGBB with RR, GG and BB three integers in hexadecimal.
Output
One line Color formated in HSV. H, S and V must be outputed as integers rounded down.
Constraints
0≤RR,GG,BB≤255
Example
Input
#FF0000
Output
(0°,100%,100%)
